languages.text: If there are no enemies adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|ea7d851dd97441e2867fe29f23364f3c} for one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} на соседних клетках нет противников, то {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от одной атаки воина в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} увеличивается на {uip|DamageBonus|ea7d851dd97441e2867fe29f23364f3c}.

traits.locale_text: If there are no enemies adjacent to the Fighter at the start of the round, the Fighter's Damage is increased by <u>2×(STR Bonus)</u> for one melee attack.

languages.text: Wenn zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} keine Feinde in der Nähe des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Kriegers{/g} sind, wird der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Kriegers um +{uip|DamageBonus|ea7d851dd97441e2867fe29f23364f3c} für einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} erhöht.
